dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3890 IH: Making Rural America Count Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Valadao (for himself, Mr. Duffy, Mr. Smucker, and Mr. Blum) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To provide that determinations of eligibility and level of assistance for rural development programs shall be made without regard to incarcerated prisoner populations.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Making Rural America Count Act.

section.header: Determinations of eligibility and level of assistance for rural development programs to be made without regard to incarcerated prisoner populations
section.text: For the purposes of determining eligibility or level of assistance for Rural Development programs, the Secretary of Agriculture shall not include incarcerated prison populations.
